title: The Determinator
detail: Intelligent football that can figure out who's using it!
extended_details: A smart football (American) that uses physical information (rotation speed, force, etc) and machine learning to determine who threw the ball. Will also include features to track how far it was thrown, and leds on the outside that light up green or red according to the quality of throw
